description: Charlie’s late on rent again. When the building manager Will Braun comes over to collect it from him, he pulls one of his classic seduction techniques to get him to do his bidding. As soon as Charlie drops his pants, Will is in a deep trance—the only thing that will break that trance is Charlie slamming his dick deep up inside him. It seems the rent check can wait.
title: Gaybait Part 2
